LanguageData.OE_Azulium.label: azulium
LanguageData.OE_Azulium.description: A common antipsychotic medicine used to prevent mental breakdowns and improve overall mood. Obsidia technology, the drug is non-addictive and has no after-effects.
LanguageData.OE_Timbium.label: timbium
LanguageData.OE_Timbium.description: Hard stimpack for workers, used by Obsidia workers to increase productivity. Obsidia technology, a stimpack can be addictive but has no after-effects.
LanguageData.OE_Garganadol.label: garganadol
LanguageData.OE_Garganadol.description: A unique medical specialty, a potent drug based on Luciferium, is used a concoction of mechanites that dramatically improve the body's functioning.\n\nDisables need: Food.
LanguageData.OE_Cofagradol.label: cofagradol
LanguageData.OE_Cofagradol.description: A unique medical specialty, a potent drug based on Luciferium, is used a concoction of mechanites that dramatically improve the body's functioning.\n\nDisables need: Rest.
LanguageData.OE_Cressadol.label: cressadol
LanguageData.OE_Cressadol.description: A unique medical specialty, a potent drug based on Luciferium, is used a concoction of mechanites that dramatically improve the body's functioning.\n\nDisables need: Recreation.
LanguageData.OE_Florgadol.label: florgadol
LanguageData.OE_Florgadol.description: A unique medical specialty, a potent drug based on Luciferium, is used a concoction of mechanites that dramatically improve the body's functioning.\n\nDisables need: Mood.
